[[inst_sw_xor]]
==== SW.XOR

*Syntax:* sw.xor<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Xor operation: memory value is atomically xored with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sw_xor.svg[SW.XOR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
